page.title: 03A Senior Citizen
page.content: This Senior Citizen often goes out visiting friends and relatives and to the shops. There's the Darby and Joan Club which he and his wife go to on alternate Thursdays.He bowls, plays bingo and cards. Mr Stanley does not find it hard to get food because there are two shops in the village and they can also go to town because they have a car. His wife has a brother whom they visit sometimes. He has a consultancy job which he spends part of each day doing.He also plays the guitar and the banjo while his wife plays the piano.They garden,read and watch T.V and his wife cooks a lot. He thinks the pension is fair.He is happy and wouldn't like to move.
